GenreMatches.Description: Matches the genre metadata against the specified genre(s).

Fields.MatchAll-Help: If all selected genres must appear in the metadata, otherwise any must appear

MovieLookup.Description:
Performs a search on TheMovieDB.org for a movie.
Stores the Metadata inside the variable 'MovieInfo'.

Fields.UseFolderName-Help: If the folder name should be used instead of the filename.

MovieRenamer.Description:
Renames the working file using the metadata stored in 'MovieInfo'.
Note: MovieLookup should be executed in the flow before this node to work.

Output 1: File was renamed
Output 2: File failed to be renamed

Fields.Pattern-Help: The pattern to use to rename the folder.  '{Title}', '{Year}', '{Extension}'.
Fields.DestinationPath-Help: If the file should be moved to a different directory.
Fields.LogOnly-Help: Turn on if you just want to test this node without it actually renaming the file

MusicMeta.Description: Loads the metadata of a music file into the flow variables.

NfoFileCreator.Description: Creates a Kodi NFO file from previously loaded metadata.

Fields.DestinationPath-Help:
The folder where the NFO file will be created in.
If empty will be created in the same directory as the original file.
Fields.DestinationFile-Help: The filename of the new NFO file.  If empty, the original filename will be used with the extension changed to `.nfo`

TVShowLookup.Description:
Performs a search on TheMovieDB.org for a TV Show.
Stores the Metadata inside the variable 'TVShowInfo'.

Fields.UseFolderName-Help:
If the folder name should be used instead of the filename.

Note if the folder starts with Season or Staffel or Saison the parent folder will be used.

TVEpisodeLookup.Description: Performs a search on TheMovieDB.org for a TV Epsidoe.
